name: Mr. Runner 2: The Masks
description:
Mr. Runner 2: The Masks, the critically acclaimed multi-million selling iOS game, is now available on Mac!

▶Quality Index's Top 10 iPhone games list of April 2013
▶The series has achieved over 5 million downloads on iOS
▶Golden Pass award at Global Game Stars event during Game Developers Conference

Reviews:
▶"Overwhelms, impresses, and entertains" - Pocket Gamer
▶"It really looks (and sounds) fantastic." - TouchArcade
▶"If you love runner games, but are tired of the usual fare, then this game is a refreshing and welcome challenge." - AppAdvice
▶"I liked the feel of the game. It’s definitely unlike any other game out there." - 148 Apps
▶"Mr. Runner 2 looks wonderfully insane" - Kotaku
▶"A love letter to all us gamers at heart" - Gamezebo
"It’s challenging and exciting like any Mega Man game during the SNES days." - GGVogue
▶"…it’s safe to say that Mr. Runner 2 does something very right." －Save Game Online

Are you speedy or cautious? You may need to be both! The mischievous Le Magie has sprung a vile trap and locked your head in a mysterious mask! Hunt down Le Magie through strange and uncharted worlds. Unlock the mask before you forget who you are!

Mr. Runner 2: The Masks is a unique side-scrolling running platformer unlike any other runner games out there. If you love runner games and want to experience something new and different, please play Mr. Runner 2 and join 5 million other gamers. You will be addicted!

FEATURES:
▶Simple control scheme to let gamers focus on the fun of the SPEED!
▶4 game worlds featuring different themes and challenges
▶32 carefully crafted levels with high replayability for HOURS of fun
▶Epic boss fights to test your evasion skills
▶Cute characters, vibrant worlds, marvelous animations, HD optimized graphics, and stunning art direction
▶54 pop-culture inspired masks
▶5 special ability outfits
▶Interactive menus: Explore the castle and meet new characters!
